name: Cat Leather Jackets
description:
Cat Leather Jackets is a short visual novel and music game about the experience of being a teenager in a punk rock band.



The game follows Priya and her bandmates Ian and David as they get together to write and rehearse songs, try to find gigs and ultimately an audience for their music – all the while trying to find independence and figuring out what they want to do with their lives.

The game features multiple rhythm gameplay segments intertwined with a kinetic novel style narrative delivered through an indie comic book aesthetic.



  • Steam Achievements;
  • An in-game beatmap editor;
  • And an album’s worth of original punk, ska and alternative rock playable beatmaps.
